featured.text: Recently in Taiwan, the manufacturing industry has ________
The 35 looped design was invented by Gem Manufacturing Ltd. in England.

definition.zh_def: 製造業，指生產商品的過程，通常涉及機械和工廠的使用。
definition.en_def: The process of producing goods, typically involving machinery and factories.
definition.example: The manufacturing of cars requires a large workforce and advanced technology.
